functions.name: daysSinceProcessStart
functions.description: Returns time in days this session has been active.

functions.name: profileAge
functions.description: Returns age in in days of the profile.

functions.name: hasGoogleAccountsLogin
functions.description: Returns a boolean indicating if the user has a Google account login saved.

functions.name: timesUsedPerMonth
functions.description: Returns avg count of how many times the user logs-in to a google account per month.

functions.name: hasGoogleCookieAndAge
functions.description: Returns an object containing a boolean indicating if the user has a cookie implying they are currently logged into Google, and containing the age of that cookie.

functions.name: hasAllowCookieExceptions
functions.description: Returns a boolean indicating if the user has set an exception allowing cookies.

functions.name: hasBlockCookieExceptions
functions.description: Returns a boolean indicating if the user has set an exception blocking cookies.

functions.name: getOldestCookieAgeInDays
functions.description: Returns the total number of days old the oldest cookie is, 0 if same day, null if no cookies.

functions.name: getActiveAddons
functions.description: Returns collection of the names and ids of all active addons.

functions.name: defaultSearchEngineIsGoogle
functions.description: Returns boolean indicating if Google is the default search engine.

functions.name: defaultPrivateSearchEngineIsGoogle
functions.description: Returns boolean indicating if Google is the default private search engine.

functions.name: countVisitsToAccountsPage
functions.description: Average of how often this user visits the Google account login/signup domain each 28 days (1 month), rounded to 1 decimal.

functions.name: searchWithAdsPlusClick
functions.description: Returns an object containing booleans 'with_ads' and 'ad_clicks' indicating if this user has executed a search with ads and clicked an ad in the past 14 days.

functions.name: getOldestHistoryAgeInDays
functions.description: Returns the total number of days old the oldest history entry is, 0 if same day, null if no history.

functions.name: getAverageHistoryDaysPerMonth
functions.description: Returns the average days in a month which have a history entry.
